Row.Text: While established in a city-state, gives it +5 [ICON_Strength] defence. Friendly units within the city's territory gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. Accumulate its Strategic resources. When suzerain receive double the amount of accumulated strategic resources.
+4 influence points per turn towards earning [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.

Replace.Text: You get +2 [ICON_Science] science and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture from each Delegation or Embassy from a foreign civilization to you.
Other cities within 9 tiles and not owned by you lose 4 Loyalty per turn.
All your Spies operate at 1 level above normal.
